_comment_id_and_secret: populate Client ID and Secret with the API key generated from API access tab in UniView portal
_comment_url: The Auth and Client URL will remain the same for any UniView EPBv2 portal, tenancy doesn't change the public API endpoint you authorize and request data from
_comment_client_url: This url can take multiple different switches. id, name, customer_id, order_by, order_direction, page_number, page_size. Refer https://apidoc-public-api.backup.net/swagger-ui-v2/index.html
CLIENT_ID: <Enter client ID from UniView API Access tab>
CLIENT_SECRET: <Enter client secret from UniView API Access tab>
